com.sb.elsinore

Class MashControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sb.elsinore.MashControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MashControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is for storing the mash steps. It automatically updating the process as it goes.
    Author:
    Doug Edey

      • activateStep

        public final boolean activateStep(java.lang.Integer position)
        Activate the step at the selected position. Deactivates the other mash steps.
        Parameters:
        position - The position to activate the step at
        Returns:
        True if activated OK, false if there's an error

      • deactivateStep

        public final boolean deactivateStep(java.lang.Integer position)
        Deactivate the step at the position specified.
        Parameters:
        position - The step to deactivate. If < 0 deactivate all.
        Returns:
        True if deactivated OK, false if not.
